NYID KYIS KYANG RLOM SEMS

SU BYED DO, ,DE SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA'I
TSE, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA
BA MED PAR, SKYE BA MTHA' LAS 'DAS PA STONG PA ZHES BYA

BYED DO, ,DE SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA

GANG GI SLAD DU, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO ZHES BGYI
BA 'DI LA BDAG KYANG SPOBS PA SKYE'O, ,BCOM

LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SH'A RA DVA TI'I BU, DON GANG GI
PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO ZHES BYA BA DE LA
SPOBS PA SKYED CIG ,SH'A RADVA TA'I BUS GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS

BDAG TU LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BA'I SLAD DU, SEMS CAN RNAMS LA CHOS
STON PA DANG, SEMS CAN DU LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, SROG TU
LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, GANG ZAG TU LTA BA RAB TU SBANG BA
DANG,

GSO BAR LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, SKYES BUR LTA BA RAB TU
SBANG BA DANG, SHED CAN TU LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BO DANG, SHED BDAG
TU LTA BA RAB TU SBANG BA DANG, BYED PA POR LTA BA RAB TU SPANG
BA DANG, BYED

RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, YONGS SU SLONG BA POR LTA BA RAB TU SPANG
BA DANG, TSOR BA POR LTA BA RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, TSOR DU 'JUG PA
POR

PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO GZUGS SU LTA BAR
'GYUR BA YIN, TSOR BAR LTA BA DANG, 'DU SHES SU LTA BA DANG,

'DU BYED DU LTA BA DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN,
DE'I PHYIR MIG TU LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, RNA BAR LTA BA DANG, SNAR
LTA BA DANG, LCER LTA BA DANG, LUS SU LTA BA DANG, YID

DU LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, DE'I PHYIR GZUGS SU LTA BAR 'GYUR BA
YIN, SGRAR LTA BA DANG, DRIR LTA BA DANG, ROR LTA BA DANG, REG TU
LTA BA DANG, CHOS SU LTA PAR 'GYUR BA YIN, DE'I

PHYIR MIG GI RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, RNA BA'I
RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BA DANG, SNA'I RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BA
DANG, LCE'I RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BA DANG, LUS KYI RNAM


@105B PAR SHES PAR LTA BA DANG, YID KYI RNAM PAR SHES PAR LTA BAR
'GYUR BA YIN, DE'I PHYIR MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PAR LTA BAR 'GYUR BA
YIN, RNA BA'I 'DUS TE REG PAR LTA BA DANG, SNA'I 'DUS TE

REG PAR LTA BA DANG, LCE'I 'DUS TE REG PAR LTA BA DANG, LUS KYI
'DUS TE REG PAR LTA BA DANG, YID KYI 'DUS TE REG PAR LTA BAR
'GYUR BA YIN, DE'I PHYIR MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS

TSOR BAR LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, RNA BA'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYAN
GYIS TSOR BAR LTA BA DANG, SNA'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR
BAR LTA BA DANG, LCE'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BAR LTA

BA DANG, LUS KYI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BAR LTA BA
DANG, YID KYI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BAR LTA BAR 'GYUR
BA YIN, DE'I PHYIR SA'I KHAMS SU LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, CHU'I

PAR LTA BA DANG, MING DANG GZUGS SU LTA BA DANG, SKYE MCHED DRUG
TU LTA BA DANG, REG PAR LTA BA DANG, TSOR BAR

LTA BA DANG, SKYE BAR LTA BA DANG, RGA SHIR LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN,

DU LTA BAR 'GYUR BA YIN, PHYI STONG PA NYID DU LTA BA DANG, PHYI

NANG STONG PA NYID DU LTA BA DANG, STONG PA NYID STONG PA NYID DU
LTA BA DANG, CHEN PO STONG PA NYID DU LTA BA DANG, DON DAM PA

DANG,

BA DANG, RANG BZHIN STONG PA NYID DU LTA BA DANG, CHOS THAMS CAD

LTA BA DANG, MI DMIGS PA STONG PA NYID DU LTA BA DANG,

MI SMOS PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSUL
KHRIMS

KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA'I TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD


@133A *, ,MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS TSUL
KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING, CHOS DE DAG LA BZOD
PA DANG, MOS PA DANG, RTEN PA 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA'I BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA
SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID
LA BYA BAS TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING,
BRTZON 'GRUS NYAMS PAR MI BYED PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA'I BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN
PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID
LA BYA BAS TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING GNAS
PA'I TSE, NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SEMS KYI GO

MI 'BYED CING DGE BA'I RTZA BA DE'ANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DANG
THUN MONG DU BYAS TE, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU BSNGO BA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

PA'I BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A
RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
LA SPYOD PA'I

TSE, CHOS THAMS CAD SGYU MAR BYAS PA'I 'DU SHES NYE BAR GNAS
SHING, TSUL KHRIMS DES RLOM SEMS SU MI BYED DE, RANG BZHIN STONG
PA NYID KYI PHYIR, TSUL KHRIMS DE'ANG MI DMIGS SHING, DGE

BA'I RTZA BA DE'ANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DANG THUN MONG DU BYAS TE,

BSNGO BA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

BYANG CHUB

'JIG RTEN CHOS KYI DBYINGS KYIS KLAS PA, NAM MKHA'I MTHAS GTUGS
PA'I PHYOGS BCU RGYAS PAR BKANG STE,

MOS PAR BYAS SHING RNAM PAR SPYOD DO, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU
GZUGS KYI 'DU SHES LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, THOGS PA'I 'DU SHES
RNAMS NUB PAR GYUR CING, SNA TSOGS

KYI 'DU SHES YID LA MI BYED PAS NAM MKHA' MTHA' YAS SO ZHES TE,
NAM MKHA' MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED LA NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,DE
RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU NAM MKHA'

MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, RNAM PAR SHES PA
MTHA' YAS SO ZHES RNAM SHES MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED LA NYE BAR
BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS

CAD DU RNAM SHES MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE,
CUNG ZAD MA YOD DO ZHES CUNG ZAD MED PA'I SKYE MCHED LA NYE BAR
BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS

CAD DU CUNG ZAD MED PA'I SKYE MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, 'DU
SHES MED 'DU SHES MED MIN SKYE MCHED LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS
NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO,,

TE, NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN 'DI DAG
DANG, TSAD MED PA 'DI DAG DANG, GZUGS

MED PA NA YOD PA 'DI DAG LA NAM MKHA'I RNAM PA DANG, TSUL DANG,
MTSAN MAS MNYAM PAR GZHOG CING, RNAM PAR LDANG BA'I TSE'ANG RNAM
PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DU YONGS SU BSNGO BA 'DI

CING, 'DOD PAS DBEN, SDIG TO MI DGE BA'I CHOS

BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,DE DGA' BA LAS 'DOD CHAGS DANG BRAL BAS DRAN
PA DANG LDAN ZHING, SHES BZHIN DU BTANG

DAG NAS RNAM PAR LDANG NGO, ,DE DAG SEMS CAN DMYAL BA DE

DAG NAS RNAM PAR LANGS NAS, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GANG DANG GANG
NA, SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS RNAMS BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG BA
DE DANG DE DAG TU SKYE'O, ,DES BYANG PHYOGS KYI 'JIG RTEN

GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED DAG NA, SEMS CAN DMYAL
BA'I ME'I PHUNG PO JI SNYED CIG YOD PA DE DAG THAMS CAD MED PAR
BYAS TE, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DE LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO ZHES BYA BA'I SGRA
BRJOD DO, ,DBYANGS SGROG GO ,DE'I TSE SEMS CAN DMYAL BA PA'I SEMS
CAN DE DAG KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SGRA DE THOS NAS, DGA' BA DANG

CAN DMYAL BA DE DAG NAS RNAM PAR LDANG NGO, ,DE DAG SEMS CAN
DMYAL BA DE DAG NAS RNAM PAR LANGS NAS,

SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GANG DANG GANG NA SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN
'DAS RNAMS BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG BA DE DANG DE DAG TU SKYE'O,
,DES BYANG SHAR GYI PHYOGS MTSAMS KYI 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS

GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED DAG NA, SEMS CAN DMYAL BA'I ME'I
PHUNG PO JI SNYED CIG YOD PA DE DAG THAMS CAD MED PAR BYAS TE, DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS

DE DAG KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SGRA DE THOS NAS, DGA' BA DANG

ROL TU PHYIN PA NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI BYED, MNGON PAR MI BYED
DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN

TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI BYED, MNGON PAR MI BYED DE, DE CI'I
PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR,
BRTZON 'GRUS

KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI BYED, MNGON PAR
MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR
RO, ,RAB 'BYOR, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA NI MI BYED,
RNAM PAR MI BYED, MNGON PAR

MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR
RO, ,RAB 'BYOR, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA NI MI BYED, RNAM
PAR MI BYED, MNGON PAR MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN
TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,

RAB 'BYOR NANG STONG PA NYID NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI BYED, MNGON
PAR MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I
PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR, PHYI STONG PA NYID NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI
BYED, MNGON PAR MI

BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO,
,RAB 'BYOR, PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID NI MI BYED, RNAM PAR MI BYED,
MNGON PAR MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS

NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR, CHEN PO STONG

STE, 'DI NI 'JIG PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,

DE LA NYI MA'I SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,
TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SGO
SNANG BAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI NYI MA'I SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE

'DZIN TO, ,DE LA ZLA BA DRI MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN
THAMS CAD MUN PA MED PAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI ZLA BA DRI MA MED PA

ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA MIG YONGS SU DAG PA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS
SHING, MIG LNGA YONGS SU DAG PAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI MIG

PA'I MUN PA

TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS SHING, TING
NGE

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SNANG BA BYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I

SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI TING NGE 'DZIN NYID

TING NGE 'DZIN

PHYIN

LDAN 'DAS, THEG PA CHEN PO THEG PA CHEN

THEG PA CHEN PO ZHES BGYI'O, ,BCOM LDAN

'DAS, THEG PA CHEN PO DE NI NAM MKHA' DANG MNYAM PA STE, JI LTAR
NAM MKHA' SEMS CAN GRANGS DANG TSAD MA MCHIS PA'I GO 'BYED PA DE
BZHIN DU THEG PA CHEN PO 'DI'ANG SEMS

KYI THEG PA CHEN PO STE, THEG PA CHEN PO

BA'ANG MA MCHIS SO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS,

'DI LTA STE, DPER NA, NAM MKHA' LA 'GRO BA 'AM 'ONG BA ZHES BGYI

BRTAGS PA, RNAM PAR BSKYED PA, YONGS SU

'DIS LHA DANG MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DU BCAS PA'I 'JIG

REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA DE RNAM PAR BRTAGS PA, RNAM PAR
BSKYED PA, YONGS SU BSGRUBS PA STE, MI RTAG

CING MI BRTAN LA THER ZUG MA YIN 'GYUR BA'I CHOS CAN TE, DNGOS PO

YIN DU BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN ZIL GYIS MNAN TE 'BYUNG

DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DU BCAS PA'I 'JIG

MA YIN PAS,

BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN ZIL GYIS MNAN CING 'BYUNG BA YIN NO, ,RAB

MI MDZAD DE, RAB 'BYOR, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG
PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GSUNG

YAN LAG DRUG CU DANG LDAN PA DNGOS PO MED LA DNGOS PO MA YIN PAS,
DE'I PHYIR DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS
PA'I SANGS RGYAS PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG

PAR GO BAR MDZAD DO, ,RAB 'BYOR, GAL TE DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA
BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS

RGYAS KYI CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO DNGOS PO YOD PA ZHIG YIN TE, DNGOS PO
MED PA MA YIN NA NI, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS CHOS KYI

MI NUS BSKOR BAR YANG MI 'GYUR TE,


@380B RAB 'BYOR, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO DNGOS PO MED DE,
DNGOS PO MA YIN PAS, DE'I PHYIR DE BZHIN GSHEGS

PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS CHOS KYI
'KHOR LO DGE SBYONG NGAM, BRAM ZE 'AM, LHA'AM, BDUD DAM, TSANGS
PA 'AM, SUS KYANG RUNG STE, 'JIG RTEN DU CHOS

DANG LDAN PAR BSKOR BAR MI NUS PA RAB TU BSKOR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR,
GAL TE DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
SANGS RGYAS KYIS GANG GI DON DU CHOS

KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR BA'I SEMS CAN DE DAG DNGOS PO YOD PA ZHIG YIN
TE, DNGOS PO MED PA MA YIN NA NI, SEMS CAN DE DAG PHUNG PO MA LUS
PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I DBYINGS

SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' BAR YANG MI 'GYUR TE, RAB 'BYOR, DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYIS
GANG GI DON DU CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR BA'I

SEMS CAN DE DAG DNGOS PO MED DE, DNGOS PO MA YIN PAS, DE'I PHYIR
SEMS CAN RNAMS PHUNG PO MA LUS PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I
DBYINGS SU YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS SO, ,YONGS

SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA'O, ,YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' BAR 'GYUR RO,
,RAB 'BYOR, GANG YANG KHYOD KYIS 'DI SKAD DU, THEG PA CHEN PO DE

MED, GAR YANG GNAS PAR

'GYUR BA MED DO, ,YID KYI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA NI

DE LTAR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THAMS CAD DU THAMS
CAD, RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MA
MTHONG MA DMIGS NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG

ZHIG SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA GANG LA GDAMS SHING RJES SU
BSTAN PAR BGYI ZHES SMRA, TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, CI'I PHYIR
NA, DE SKAD DU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NYID KYANG RIL GYIS

YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MA MTHONG MA DMIGS NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO GANG ZHIG SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA GANG
LA GDAMS SHING RJES SU BSTAN PAR

BGYI ZHES SMRA, TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, CI'I PHYIR NA, DE
SKAD DU BCOM LDAN 'DAS BYANG CHUB SEMS DANG SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI MING TZAM DU BAS SO ZHES SMRA, TSE

DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, CI'I PHYIR NA, DE SKAD DU JI LTAR BDAG
BDAG CES BGYI'ANG, BDAG NI MNGON PAR GRUB PA MA MCHIS SO, ,BCOM
LDAN 'DAS, DE BZHIN DU BYANG CHUB SEMS

DNGOS PO MA MCHIS PA'I RANG BZHIN

LA, GZUGS MNGON PAR GRUB PA LTA'ANG GANG ZHIG MCHIS, TSOR BA

GRUB PA LTA'ANG GANG ZHIG MCHIS, 'DU BYED

DE NI GZUGS MA LAGS SO, ,GANG MNGON

YIN PA DANG, REG NGO BO NYID MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' GANG YIN PA DANG, SNGON GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG,
PHYI MA'I MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, DBUS

GANG YIN PA DE THAMS CAD KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR MED
DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, CHOS MED PA'I PHYIR
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,


@479B CHOS STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI

SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,CHOS NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR

PHYIR ZHE NA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU,

NYID DANG, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA DBEN PA DANG, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG
PA NGO BO NYID MED PA LA SNGON GYI MTHA'

TE REG PA MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA STONG PA
NYID KYANG GZHAN

MA YIN, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA DBEN PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, MIG GI

SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN,

DANG, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA DBEN PA GANG YIN PA DANG, MIG GI 'DUS
TE REG PA NGO BO NYID MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG,

MTHA' MI DMIGS, PHYI MA'I MTHA' MI DMIGS, DBUS MI DMIGS TE, RNA

DE THAMS CAD KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR

PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,ME'I

YANG GZHAN MA YIN, PHYI MA'I MTHA' YANG GZHAN

MA YIN, DBUS KYANG GZHAN MA YIN NO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA
TI'I BU, DE LTAR NA SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA MED PA GANG
YIN PA DANG, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA STONG PA NYID GANG

DANG, DBUS GANG YIN PA DE THAMS CAD KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS
SU BYAR MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU,

MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA
STONG PA NYID GANG YIN PA DANG, MTHAR

GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DBEN PA GANG YIN PA DANG, ,
MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA NGO BO NYID MED PA GANG
YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG

YIN PA DANG, SNGON GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, PHYI MA'I MTHA'
GANG YIN PA DANG, DBUS GANG YIN PA DE THAMS CAD KYANG GNYIS SU
MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A

RADVA TI'I BU, RNAM PAR THAR PA'I SGO STONG PA NYID DANG, MTSAN
MA MED PA DANG, SMON PA MED PA MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,RNAM PAR THAR

STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI
DMIGS SO, ,RNAM PAR THAR PA'I SGO STONG PA NYID

DANG; MTSAN MA MED PA DANG, SMON PA MED PA DBEN PA'I PHYIR BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,RNAM PAR THAR PA'I
SGO STONG PA NYID DANG, MTSAN MA MED PA

RGYAS MED PA DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS STONG PA NYID DANG, RANG
SANGS RGYAS DBEN PA DANG, RANG SANGS

RGYAS NGO BO NYID MED PA LA SNGON GYI MTHA' MI DMIGS, PHYI MA'I
MTHA' MI DMIGS, DBUS MI DMIGS TE, RANG SANGS RGYAS MED PA'ANG
GZHAN MA YIN, RANG SANGS RGYAS STONG

PA NYID KYANG GZHAN MA YIN, RANG SANGS RGYAS DBEN PA'ANG GZHAN MA
YIN, RANG SANGS RGYAS NGO BO NYID MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN,

SNGON GYI MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN, PHYI MA'I MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA
YIN, DBUS KYANG GZHAN MA YIN NO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA
TI'I BU, DE LTAR NA RANG SANGS RGYAS MED PA

GANG YIN PA DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS STONG PA NYID GANG YIN PA
DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS DBEN PA GANG YIN PA DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS
NGO BO NYID MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' GANG YIN PA DANG, SNGON GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG,
PHYI MA'I MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, DBUS GANG YIN PA DE THAMS CAD
KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR

MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI
MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS


@562B DPA' STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI
MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBEN PA'I PHYIR BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO,,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA'I
PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR

MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
DBEN PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI

MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NGO BO NYID MED
PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO,
,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' STONG PA
NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' DBEN PA'I PHYIR

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS
SO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, TSE DANG

LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA DANG,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' STONG PA NYID DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
DBEN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NGO BO NYID


@563A *, ,MED PA LA SNGON GYI MTHA' MI DMIGS, PHYI MA'I MTHA' MI
DMIGS, DBUS MI DMIGS TE, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA
YIN, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' STONG PA NYID KYANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
DBEN PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NGO BO NYID MED
PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN, SNGON GYI MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN,
PHYI MA'I MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN, DBUS KYANG GZHAN MA YIN NO,
,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU,

DE LTAR NA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' STONG PA NYID GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' DBEN PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' NGO BO NYID MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' GANG YIN PA DANG, SNGON GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, PHYI
MA'I MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, DBUS

GANG YIN PA DE THAMS CAD KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR MED
DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA STONG PA
NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHA' MI DMIGS SO,
,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DBEN PA'I


@563B PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO,
,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS
SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA DBEN PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS
SO, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS
SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA DBEN PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS, DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO,
,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR

ZHE NA, TSE DANG LDAN PAR SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
MED PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA STONG PA NYID DANG, THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA DBEN PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED

PA LA SNGON GYI MTHA' MI DMIGS, PHYI MA'I MTHA' MI DMIGS, DBUS MI
DMIGS TE, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA STONG PA NYID KYANG GZHAN MA YIN, THAMS


@564A *, ,CAD MKHYEN PA DBEN PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' YANG GZHAN

MA YIN, SNGON GYI MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN, PHYI MA'I MTHA' YANG
GZHAN MA YIN, DBUS KYANG GZHAN MA YIN NO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PAR SH'A
RADVA TI'I BU, DE LTAR NA THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA MED PA GANG YIN PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA STONG PA NYID
GANG YIN PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DBEN PA GANG YIN PA DANG,
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGO BO NYID MED

PA GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG YIN PA DANG, SNGON
GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, PHYI MA'I MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG,
DBUS GANG YIN PA DE THAMS

CAD KYANG GNYIS SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA
SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, RNAM GRANGS DES NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON
GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB
